text: Tumi ki tabe parityagakari habe tomara kache ya pratyadista hayeche tara kichu ansa, ara tomara baksa era dbara sankucita karabe yehetu tara bale -- ''tara kache kena kono dhanabhandara pathano haya na athaba tara sange kono phiris‌ta ase na?’’ Nihsandeha tumi to ekajana satarkakari. Ara allah saba-kichura upare karnadhara.
